edu.cnm.deepdive.eb.flashme.activities

Class ImageActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.SupportActivity
        • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
          • android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
            • edu.cnm.deepdive.eb.flashme.activities.ImageActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompatApi23.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, OrmHelper.OrmInteraction

    public class ImageActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements OrmHelper.OrmInteraction
    A class that handles the keyword to image relationship. This class utilizes Square's Picasso Library to use individual image url provided by the BroadcastReceiver as image uri for each ImageView.
